intro: Psychotria satabiei, commonly known as the Satabie psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, often found in the understory of tropical forests. Psychotria satabiei is noted for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
